website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and stylish low-top sneaker comes in the form of the Airwalk Brock.Several users can attest that is also lightweight and can keep the foot warm, especially during cold days. However, there are some issues when it comes to the shoe’s sizing and durability. It received many comments regarding the sole falling apart after a few months of use. But for those who are looking for a budget-friendly skater shoe that can also be worn to school or work, the Airwalk Brock is not a bad choice.
pros: Majority of purchasers were reasonably satisfied with the affordable price tag of the Airwalk Brock
A lot of owners described this sneaker as nice looking
Some wearers noticed that this shoe is great for the winter as it keeps the foot warm inside
Many of those who have tried this kick commented that it is very comfortable
One said that it felt better on foot compared to his Vans skater shoe
This sneaker felt lightweight, according to a few users
The Airwalk Brock is great for work and school, based on a number of reviews
A couple of sneakerheads with foot problems recommend this shoe as it offers the support that they need
cons: Numerous customers were disappointed with the quality of this shoe
They said that the soles started falling apart or getting holes after 2-12 months of wear
Several comments mentioned that this shoe runs small
The laces are too long, said one person
Another individual did not like the back of the shoe saying that it is too low and felt as if the foot can easily slip out

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and well fitting low-quality tat
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and love the style, however the build quality is far from great. After only a few months of wear the sole is completely worn at the back of the sole and the outer-edges of the sole-surround are are detaching from the main shoe. I would hoped Airwalk would be a name on which I could rely, but I'll be avoiding them in future.
customer_reviews.author: Lemony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loving these shoes. I am t2 diabetic and require soft top shoes and these guys fit the bill perfectly. I also have a metal plate in my ankle from a repair to a broken bone and the cushioned heel/ankle protects it like a dream. These trainers are hard wearing, stylish and functional. Highly recommended. Didnt give 5 stars due to the fact that amazon recommended size 9 (I usually take an 8) and the 9 is slightly large when wearing thin socks but with thick socks they should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: I like Airwalk produts
customer_reviews.text: I like Airwalk skate shoes, they're comfortable. Do not go anywhere near the listed company (This Is Pulp) marketing this item. They sent me a different product and refuse to refund me. I've lost many, many hours on the case. Airwalk are good, I once had snowboard boots by them. Repeat, be careful who you order from and avoid This Is Pulp. I'm taking legal advice presently.
customer_reviews.author: Mindpower

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and poor value.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality - these are not even 12 months old and only worn occasionally. The soles have split and the sides have come apart from the uppers. I was hoping they'd last longer than this but they're only fit for the bin now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate BUY
customer_reviews.text: Firstly excellent service. Product arrived as advertised on correct date. The sizing is perfect too. I love these shoes which I now wear all the time. They are comfortable, lightweight and stylish. Do not hesitate to buy these
customer_reviews.author: simon needs

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, soft and comfortable. Average quality and construction but good for the price paid. Good foot ventilation - will not keep feet warm enough in cold weather . I usually buy Etnies which are way better in quality. but twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nicholas  K

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally write a review, but I am this time. I ordered these trainers as my other half has always wore these he wore them for a couple of month and they broke, the sole inside came away and made it so uncomfortable to wear and the the sides split. Well i contacted the seller sent a few photos and the seller replaced straight away as soon as he received the ones I returned. I wouldnt hesitate the buy again as the seller is very good
customer_reviews.author: Debbie brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is diabetic and takes great care of his feet. These are the second pair he has had having worn the others for a year for 12 hour care work shifts. Comfortable and supportive and smart enough for work.
customer_reviews.author: liz kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I've had a pair previous. The fit bang on straight out the box and are very comfortable. You will get about a year or more out of them but for the price? its worth it

customer_reviews.title: ... very similar but in a different colour which are great but falling apart after wearing them for over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as I've got a pair very similar but in a different colour which are great but falling apart after wearing them for over a year now. Unfortunately these ones seem to be a size too small. Bought the exact same size as my old one's (UK10) but you can actually see the difference in size when holding the 2 pairs together. They look great but not sure if I'll order them again.

customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great price! I'm quite fussy when it comes to shoes, so I was very pleased when I saw these. The style and design are perfect and the price was unbeatable! I even bought another pair in a different colour.

customer_reviews.title: As good as Vans but half the price!
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to buy Vans Baxter in Black size 10. Came across these airwalk trainers. I normally wear a size 10 but found that a 10 in the Vans were a bit snug so opted to get the airwalks in a 10.5. Much better fit and they look virtually identical to the Vans and as they cost only twenty odds pounds they were half the price too. I am very pleased with these trainers and have gone on to buy three pairs in total. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Very Ugly
customer_reviews.text: These are the ugliest things I've seen in a while. I really don't know why they have to be so fat and wide. I can't really talk about performance because once I got them, I sent it straight back but I tried it on to see how they would look and the insane amount of padding makes it very uncomfortable. The one picture they provided really doesn't do the customer any favours as well. I guess some people might be into these style of shoes but I just want everyone to know how fat and ugly these things are before you buy them.

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few hours at a time and they're cool. Today I had em on all day and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worn these for a few hours at a time and they're cool. Today I had em on all day and my feet are killing me. The padding in the tongue is a bit to much, its giving me painful cramp. If you do buy em, fill em full of stones and shove em in a cement mixer for an hour. I have very wide feet, and although they fit well; who the hell wants cramp? If you want these shoes n live near london, they're yours.

I have made the mistake of buying these before with the same problem, but never again. The service that the seller has provided has no impact on the bad review, as the service was fantastic.

product_meta.title: Airwalk Mens Brock Skate Shoes Lace Up Suede Accents Sport Casual Trainers
product_meta.description:
Airwalk Brock Mens Skate Shoes

The Airwalk Brock Mens Skate Shoes are perfect for any skating enthusiast thanks to the durable gripped sole, complete with flex grooves for maximum traction on all surface types and increased flexibility of the foot. These mens skate shoes also benefit from a cushioned insole, combined with a padded tongue and shaped ankle collar for a comfortable ride whilst the perforated exit holes to the upper ensure optimum airflow and increased ventilation - finished with faux suede accents and Airwalk branding for a cool and contemporary look. 

Skate shoes
Durable gripped sole complete with flex grooves
Padded tongue and ankle collar
Cushioned insole
Suede accents
Perforated exit holes to the upper
Airwalk branding
Sole: synthetic. Upper: synthetic/textile. Inner: Textile
feature_bullets: Durable gripped sole complete with flex grooves
Perforated exit holes to the upper
